title: Unit Testing Strategy Phase 1 Complete
content:
Phase 1 of comprehensive unit testing strategy is complete with 13 BroadcastManager cross-tab tests passing. Testing infrastructure created includes:
- Cross-tab simulator (tests/helpers/cross-tab-simulator.js) for multi-tab testing
- Test utilities (tests/helpers/quick-tabs-test-utils.js) with async wait helpers
- Test fixtures (tests/fixtures/quick-tabs-state.js) with reusable test data

Remaining phases to implement:
Phase 2: SyncCoordinator, VisibilityHandler, UpdateHandler tests
Phase 3: StateManager persistence, Container isolation tests  
Phase 4: PanelManager tests
Phase 5: 20 integration scenarios from issue-47-revised-scenarios.md

All tests currently passing: 1827 tests, 52 test suites, 0 failures.
